description:
This bottle can make those sweaty summer suffer-fests, a bit more bearable. Double-walled stainless steel construction means the Bivo Trio bottle will keep your drink of choice chilled for 12+ hours. Bivo uses a little space-age know how (their engineer used to work for NASA) to outfit this bottle with a high-flow sport nozzle that uses gravity to deliver your hydration, no more squeezing.

  • Double-walled stainless steel insulation keeps drinks cold for more than 12 hours
  • Stainless steel is durable and 100% recyclable
  • Gravity-flow sport lid provides high-flow without the need to squeeze
  • Fits most standard bottle cages
  • 26cm long
name: Bivo Trio Raw 621ml Insulated Water Bottle
